mapper.insert: insert into `user` (user_name, nickname, avatar, high_score, pwd, email, game_data, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values (#{userName}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{highScore}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{gameData}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update `user` set nickname = #{nickname}, avatar = #{avatar}, high_score = #{highScore}, pwd = #{pwd}, email = #{email}, game_data = #{gameData}, gmt_modified = now() where id = #{id}
